name: Retro Radio
description:
This is skeuomorphic imagination of retro Radio made completely in Figma. This is just a blend of gradients, drop shadows and inner shadows used in various combinations. I have used photos and renders of many retro Radios as references before making this.


Share and spread the love!

If you have any suggestions/inputs/ideas, please feel free to reach out to me.
